item.description:
I have ideas. Ideas are commodities - it's the planning, hard work and execution that makes something a reality. 

 

I want us to harness our collective talents and literally partner on putting together a real business plan, and take an idea as far as we can.  

 

If you have a plan and it's stalled then we will get it moving.  If you have an idea that we all love, we divide up the work and get things moving. 

 

Action is what we will be about.  Only through innovation will we all succeed and not have to care about debt ceiling and political theatre.  This can do good. This can make a difference.  This can be fun.
item.how_to_find_us: Looking for a cool place in Boston, JP, or Cambridge
item.name: Meet to network and discuss the new revolutionary concept for this group!
